member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.CapptainAgent.OnTombstoned(Microsoft.Phone.Shell.ActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Restore Capptain after an application activation from a tombstoned state.

member.name: F:Capptain.Agent.DeviceStatus.REGEX_PHONE
member.summary: Contain a regex to identify a phone number. Simply look for a plus sign followed by a sequence of digits/spaces/parenthesis/dash.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.DeviceStatus.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new device status. Should be run in a task.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.DeviceStatus.GetTechnicals
member.summary: Get all technical information regarding the device.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.DeviceStatus.GetScreenSize
member.summary: Get the screen size. Synchrone method, can take up to 2s.
member.returns: A WxH string, where W is the width, and H the height.

member.name: T:Capptain.Agent.CapptainPage
member.summary: Helper class used to replace Windows Phone's PhoneApplicationPage class. Automatically starts a new Capptain activity when displayed.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.CapptainPage.OnNavigatedTo(System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Send an activity to the capptain backend when the page is displayed (not loaded).

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.CapptainPage.GetCapptainPageName
member.summary: Override this to specify the name reported by your page. The default implementation returns the simple name of the class and removes the "Page" suffix if any (e.g. "MainPage" -> "Main").
member.returns: The page name reported by the Capptain service.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.CapptainPage.GetCapptainPageExtra
member.summary: Override this to attach extra information to your page. The default implementation attaches no extra information (i.e. return null).
member.returns: Page extra information, null or empty if no extra.

member.name: T:Capptain.Agent.ApplicationLifecycleManager
member.summary: Application lifecycle management for Windows Phone.

member.name: M:Capptain.Agent.DeviceIdentification.GetDeviceId
member.summary: Find the device id of the current device
member.returns: The device id as a MD5
